Math 300Z is a proposed revision to Math 300 that will be taught for the first time in Spring 2023. The revisions apply only to Lessons 19 and up; the first 18 lessons will come from Math 300.

* Course textbook: [*Lessons in Statistical Thinking*](Textbook/index.html)

* R Software package: `math300` can be installed with 

::: {.callout-warning}
## Need to test this 

```r
remotes::install_github("dtkaplan/Math-300R/_Package")
```

:::
